categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: The 612th Attack Battalion was a unit apart of the Grand Army of the Republic, led by Commander "Ganch". They were assigned to Jedi Master Bolla Ropal and worked closely with Ropal's Padawan, Tyzen Xebec. After Bolla's death, they were assigned to Jedi General Keelyvine Reus, Tyzen's new Jedi Master.
